attributes.action: consider Taxing People When They Refuse To Identify Their Childrens Parentage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many families are made up with children, each with a different father. Fathers of those children must be identified because unless identified their child's support is covered by our social system and the fathers are free to father other children causing further cost to the tax payer in general.
